item.title: VRF-Lite Configuration
item.description: Hello everyone, in this LAB I will configure GRE Tunnels with following topology. R1: #INTERFACE CONFIGURATION R1>en R1#conf t R1(config)#int e0/0 R1(config-if)#ip addr 10.0.1.1 255.255.255.0 R1(config-if)#no sh R1(config-if)#int e0/1 R1(config-if)#ip addr 1.1.1.2 255.255.255.252 R1(config-if)#no sh R1(config-if)#exit #OSPF R1(config)#router ospf 1 R1(config-router)#network 1.1.1.0 0.0.0.3 area 0 R1(config-router)#network 10.0.1.0 0.0.0.255 area 0 R1(config-router)#exit R2: #INTERFACE CONFIGURATION R2>en R2#conf t R2(config)#int e0/0 R2(config-if)#ip addr 10.0.2.1 255.255.255.0 R2(config-if)#no sh R2(config-if)#int e0/2 R2(config-if)#ip addr 1.1.2.2 255.
